title: Freezeezy Peak
description: Get the wahays ready. The placement of FP in your run varies massively depending on your route.

general.name: Yolo Star
general.description: This is a fast method to fly through the star at the top of the christmas tree. If you do not want to do Yolo Star, the next best thing is: beakbomb through the star for the first one, turn and fly into it for the second, then beakbust and hold back for the third (press Z as soon as you hear the star sound from the second pass through).

general.name: No-Scoping the Christmas Tree
general.description: This is a tutorial for how you can shoot the tree switch without looking.

general.name: Honeycomb Swim
general.description: You can get into the tunnel in Wozza's cave meant for Walrus Banjo as regular banjo. This is used to grab the honeycomb and end FP in 100%.

general.name: 100% Boggy Races
general.description: Both boggy race strats are covered here.

outofbounds.name: FP Early
outofbounds.description: This trick is used in any% and the fastest route in 100%. *Star Fox voice*: Good luck
